snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board on Tuesday determined that a fatal crash last year in California between a FedEx truck and a bus was probably caused by the driver of the truck.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board says fatal 2014 crash between FedEx truck and bus in Orland, Calif, that killed 10 people was probably caused by truck's driver; investigation ruled out fatigue, medical condition, drugs or alcohol as contributing factors to crash.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board on Tuesday determined that a fatal crash last year in California between a FedEx truck and a bus was probably caused by the driver of the truck.

headline.main: Truck Driver Was Probably at Fault in Crash That Killed 10, N.T.S.B. Says
headline.print_headline: Truck Driver Was Probably at Fault in Crash That Killed 10, N.T.S.B. Says
